full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DE'I GANG DAG GZHIS SDOD KYI DGON GRONG CI RIGS PAR RGYUN BAR BZA' BTUNG GA-YOS BSKOL GYI THAB TU ME LHA MCHOG TSUL STABS BDE BA ZHIG BYED PAR 'DOD PA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU NA DZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MTSAD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN RUNG BZHIG MI SNANG BAS KHUNGS LJON 'KHYER BDE'I CHOG ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG SROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAN DU BRIS PA 'DIS BAR SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
